sentences.sentence: Excessive pressure can lead to perforation of the stomach wall.
sentences.translation: 过大的压力会导致胃壁穿孔。

sentences.sentence: Cardiac orifice mucosal laceration and oozing of blood were 73.9%, but without perforation and massive hemorrhage.
sentences.translation: 贲门黏膜撕裂、渗血占73.9%，但无穿孔和大出血。

sentences.sentence: This paper reports the pathological changes about the Perforation Disease in Carp caused by Aeromonas hydrophila subsp.
sentences.translation: 本文报道了嗜水气单胞菌亚种引起的鲤鱼穿孔病的病理变化。
